item.title: Oscars: Norway Picks Joachim Trier’s Family Drama ‘Sentimental Value’ for Best Int’l Feature Race
item.description: Renate Reinsve, Stellan Skarsgard, Elle Fanning, and newcomer Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas star in the feature, which won the Grand Prix honor in Cannes.

item.title: Elle Fanning Credits Fans for Her ‘Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping’ Casting
item.description: The actress is set to play Effie Trinket in the prequel film.

item.title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Comic-Con Panel Shows Off First 15 Minutes, Gives Away Predator Masks
item.description: Dan Trachtenberg finally gets the Comic-Con he dreamt of when he was a young fan.
